comment.author: 21199182@N00
comment._content: I have to correct you, this shows the Schiller place in Stuttgart, Germany! I can identify the building as old chancellery, the piece on the left is from the "Stiftskirche" and on the right corner is the column that faces the old castle and castle place in Stuttgart! The statuette shows Friedrich Schiller. This shows the column and chancellery from the opposite direction:

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
ceaabe: We're so glad you corrected us! The information we have on the photographs are not always exact - and sometimes evidently even incorrect...

Thanks to your observation, we can now improve our information and put it all right, here on Flickr Commons and in our photo database. 

/Anna B.

comment.author: 21199182@N00
comment._content: I recently did a nowadays comparison shot. Some things have changed...

comment._content: On the new picture those very old buildings look like plastic! I like the original image, that shows it's history and age.
